Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Impromptu brillant sur des thèmes de Rossini et Spontini, S. 150

1824 · LW A5 · R. 29

[IMSLP]

The impromptu is based on four themes, one each from Gioacchino Rossini’s operas La donna del lago and Armida and Gaspare Spontini’s operas Olympie and Fernand Cortez.

Liszt later re-used the introduction to this piece as the introduction to the seventh études of the Douze Grandes études (S. 137; LW A39; R. 2a) and the Douze Études d’exécution transcendante (S. 139; LW A172; R. 2b).

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · II/1 · Z. A/B 8766 · Free Arrangements I · ed. Györgyi Éger / Géza Gémesi / Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok

Duration: 11' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
